item.title: Diversity With Tidycensus
item.description: There are very few recent packages that I can say shaved a month off of my dissertation work, particularly in a language like R where there are 3,000,000 ways to do the same thing. But tidycensus, my hat’s off to you 👏👏👏! If you need Census data (or not) I strongly urge you to check out Kyle Walker’s tidycnesus. Diversity is a difficult concept. It might be even more difficult to assess simply because there are several ways to measure it.
